attributes.action: Create A British Space Agency To Put Satellites/Manned Space Vehicles Into Space that Does Not Rely On Other Countries Putting Them Into Space For Us.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government should spend more on a British Space Program, for too long have we relied on other countries and foreign governments to do this on our behalf, this is a loss to our prestige and hurtful not only to the British economy but to our science and industry.

If Iran can put there own satellites into orbit why cant we? We are one of the most developed nations in the world yet countries like India / Iran can do this on there own, and they are third world countries heavily in debt.
